entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:25 PM CST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of light snow. High minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near noon. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:25 PM CST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 23. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow early in the evening. Clearing before morning. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 20 in the evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:25 PM CST Sunday 01 January 2023
